duties_responsibilities.duty: Elevating selling motions to focus on business outcomes and cross-architecture opportunities.
Identifying potential large opportunities outside of the current fiscal quarter.
Driving customer actions around consumption models and early deployment of new solutions.
Orchestrating and deploying the extended team to deliver vertical and/or architectural solutions.
Engaging as a player-coach with aligned account teams.
Developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote freight and logistics services.
Lead a team of marketing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Managing the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Planning and overseeing participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measuring and reporting on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
Linkage of the Architectures to drive business relevance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
